DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this operations research study is to evaluate women's interest in and compliance with using a semiquantitative multi-level dipstick pregnancy test at home for medical abortion follow-up.
DOC.criteria: She has been determined by the site investigator or designee to be fully eligible for medical abortion with mifepristone followed by misoprostol according to the site's standard criteria; She is willing to use the semiquantitative pregnancy test at home; She is wiling and able to comply with the study procedures; She speaks and reads English; She has signed the study informed consent form.
